org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.cache.result
Class ResultCacheColumn

java.lang.Object
  org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.cache.result.AbstractResultCache
      org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.cache.result.ResultCache
          org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.cache.result.ResultCacheColumn
All Implemented Interfaces:
XmlComponent
public class ResultCacheColumn
extends ResultCache

This is a query cache implementation with a column granularity:

  • COLUMN: column granularity, entries in the cache are invalidated based on column dependencies

Version:
1.0
Author:
Emmanuel Cecchet , Nicolas Modrzyk
